name: Fast Cubes (itch)
description:
Defend the golden cube from the evil red cubes.

You are awarded points when a red cube passes harmlessly past the golden cube but not when you destroy one!

The golden cube will get bigger as your score increases.

Try to get the highest score possible. Challenge your friends to beat your high score.

Controls:

Move left/right : left arrow / right arrow

Shoot: Spacebar

Restart: r
